author: tmeyjes
title: Horrifying moment woman plunges off bridge to avoid London terror attacker’s car
text:
A woman is seen falling or jumping from the bridge as the car sped past (Picture: Universal News And Sport) This is the horrifying moment a woman plunged from Westminister Bridge into the River Thames avoiding a car as it ploughed past during the London terror attack.
Remarkably, the woman was rescued alive following the attack, which saw five people killed and another 40 people injured.
Keith Palmer named as officer killed in London terror attack as five confirmed dead The driver raced his Hyundai 4×4 down the pavement of the bridge before crashing it into the railings outside the Houses of Parliament and stabbing unarmed police officer Keith Palmer to death.
Also on the bridge were three police officers, two of whom are in a critical condition in hospital, French school children and five South Korean tourists.
It is not known whether the woman jumped out of the way of the speeding vehicle or fell off the bridge.
This embed is invalid
It is believed the attrocity was only carried out by one attacker however, Metropolitan Police counterterrorism chief Mark Rowley said earlier it would be ‘foolish to be overconfident early on’.
Although the name of the attacker has not been revealed police think they know who it is and believe he was motivated by Islamic extremism.
MORE: Keith Palmer named as officer killed in London terror attack as five confirmed dead 
MORE: Theresa May speech on London terror attack: ‘We will all move forward together’
